definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鲍尔温承认工作人员无法用扫描仪监控所有物品。

sentences.english: I suppose the scanner hates me.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这台扫描仪老跟我作对。

sentences.english: A novel laser confocal biochip scanner was given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种新颖的激光共焦生物芯片扫描仪。

sentences.english: Brain scanners measure levels of neural activity by tracking blood flow.
sentences.chinese: 大脑扫描仪通过跟踪血流量测验了神经活动的级别。

sentences.english: Configures installed scanners and digital cameras.
sentences.chinese: 配置已安装的扫描仪与数字相机。

sentences.english: Calculation of radiant sensitivity for space-borne multispectral scanner is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了航天遥感多光谱扫描仪的辐射灵敏度计算。

sentences.english: All patients were examined with standard Xrays and 64slice spiral CT scanner.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者均行X线检查和64层螺旋CT扫描仪扫描。

sentences.english: First, it uses a laser scanner to determine the exact size and shape of the lesion.
sentences.chinese: 首先，它用激光扫描仪来确定伤口的准确大小和形状。

sentences.english: Raman devices work by shooting a laser beam at an object.
sentences.chinese: 拉曼扫描仪靠向鉴定对象发射出的激光束工作。

sentences.english: The developed detector modules satisfy the requirements of the ocean watercolor scanner.
sentences.chinese: 满足了海洋水色扫描仪的使用要求。

sentences.english: The millimeter-wave machine is grayish-white and is more cylindrical.
sentences.chinese: 而毫米波扫描仪则是灰白色的，有些像圆柱形。

sentences.english: Dr Dresler speculated that the reason was his chosen brain scanner.
sentences.chinese: Dresler博士猜测是他选的扫描仪的导致的。

sentences.english: Please insert the calibration card face up, with the arrows pointing towards the scanner.
sentences.chinese: 请插入校正卡，并保证其正面朝上，箭头指向扫描仪。

sentences.english: A laser scanner takes measurements of the Mona Lisa in this undated handout photo.
sentences.chinese: 激光扫描仪被用于这张位表明日期的蒙娜丽莎照片。

sentences.english: Scanners at seaports are unable to detect the presence of deadly radiation in cargo containers. Here are just a few of the questions that each candidate should answer
sentences.chinese: 海港的扫描仪还不能探测出集装箱里致命的放射物质。

sentences.english: Indicates whether the end of a line was reached after the scanner scans or peeks for a token.
sentences.chinese: 指示在扫描仪扫描或查看标记后是否到达了行尾。

definition: variant of 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1]/camera
